这个问题可以通过动态路由来实现，提供方不同系统配置不同的<dubbo:parameter> 消费方在自定义路由里面根据你的业务类型判断需要走到哪个系统，这个是动态的
good idea
@chickenlj thank you very much。
@takeseem 如果直接用dubbo-admin。假设有A和B两个admin，你先访问的是A，从A拿到一个ID为100的服务，这个时候你要操作这个服务，但是这个时候A挂了，Nginx将你的请求转发给B，B因为之前没有登陆过，需要重新登陆，之后的操作步骤需要重新开始，这样看是没有问题的。但是浏览器中之前的页面没有关闭掉，继续操作的话，还是会有操作错服务的风险。
@qinliujie 管理、监控、服务治理可以私聊下，我们也可以提供相关人员的支持。
@qinliujie https://github.com/dubboclub/dubbokeeper 这个项目主要做的是dubbo的管理和监控，是否已经考量过了？
had fix it by #1003

We have been concerned about the awesome features in dubbox, thanks for making this contribution.
Are you an official partner of dubbox? Maybe we can issue an announcement separately, so both users of dubbo and dubbox can notice this change. We can continue to promote these features on the dubbo project.

when I use IDEA to run this application,I found IDEA load a javaagent /Applications/IntelliJ IDEA.app/Contents/lib/idea_rt.jar, I remove this javaagent in command line ,and it begin to work well
done

是文件最后的字符串解码出现错误了？hession序列化的问题？看了源码，大致是对输入的流进行读取字符串，然后switch语句匹配不上，之后抛出的异常。有遇见过的吗？之前看见过map类型，我这个是String类型，我们这里加了个基于jmx的监控，收集一些内存、线程等信息，之后发给zookeeper，但是上面配置的是1秒钟一次，而这上面有段好长的日志都是15秒一次

You should not use group, in theory, this goal should be achieved by routing. But dubbo do not support argument routing at this moment.  The good news is that this feature will be supported in the near future.

因为现在大多数用dubbo的公司，为了避免极端情况下的雪崩和流量风暴，大部分接口都会关闭重试机制，这样，对于当前dubbo优雅停机的设定，就无法做到优雅停机了，所以这里通过比较简单的方式，加大了在不重试情况下优雅停机的成功率。

http://blog.csdn.net/manzhizhen/article/details/78756370

```

	at com.alibaba.dubbo.rpc.cluster.support.FailoverClusterInvoker.doInvoke(FailoverClusterInvoker.java:101)
	at com.alibaba.dubbo.rpc.cluster.support.AbstractClusterInvoker.invoke(AbstractClusterInvoker.java:229)

Caused by: com.alibaba.dubbo.remoting.RemotingException: message can not send, because channel is closed . url:dubbo://172.30.97.211:8887/com.manzhizhen.dubbo.service.Dubbo2Service?anyhost=true&application=mzz-dubbo1&check=false&codec=dubbo&default.connections=3&default.token=true&dispatcher=message&dubbo=2.5.7&generic=false&heartbeat=60000&interface=com.manzhizhen.dubbo.service.Dubbo2Service&loadbalance=roundrobin&methods=service2&pid=1508&register.ip=172.30.97.211&remote.timestamp=1512800036146&retries=0&revision=1.0.0&side=consumer&timeout=2000&timestamp=1512800235497&version=1.0.0
```

使用改造后的dubbo，所有配置都不变，kill其中一个B模块，A模块没有抛任何异常。
Wait after unregister is a good point, especially for provider.  Current process do need this step. But we decide to use this feature instead 49525b0a83e7809a603f420d807b433b268dd2b4.

如果想调整provider和consumer的等待时间，只需要在dubbo.properties中设置如下key就可以：
provider.shutdown.min.wait=5000
consumer.shutdown.min.wait=2000

Official support for spring-5.x is still not in the plan.

1. You should first figure out the difference of [`Broadcast`](http://dubbo.io/books/dubbo-user-book/demos/fault-tolerent-strategy.html) and [`Group Merge`](http://dubbo.io/books/dubbo-user-book/demos/group-merger.html)
2. No provider can be invoked using `group="*"`(Group Merge)
* Check again `调用不会报错，但无法调用到服务`
* I remember there's a bug in MergeableCluster, but need further check.
3. Dubbo use group/interface:version for service identification, you can never use `group=null` while all providers have a group.
pls. attach your demo application here for further investigation. thanks.

Your project cost more than 147s to finish start? Is there any time costing initialization process in your service bean? 
Is the cost mainly on the consumer side, waiting for the registry notification of providers and establish connection? If so, maybe we can make the notification process(time costing) asynchronous.

> dubbo local cache .

You used dubbo's `Cache` SPI to achieve this?
so it should be coming soon ? looking forward to it .

It means the reference to the specified registry center, so I translate it as "Configuration association". 

Sorry be late to reply.

I think a rich test case is necessary for the quality of the code. Travis Ci and codecov were only popular in the last two years. Codecov does help us check every PR test code and improve the test code coverage.

@tuser4198 How about your translate job? I have finished the last 7 pages work. If you finish, please fork first, then push commits, and create a pull request.

:)

I guess consul has higher availability performance than zookeeper.
And, as a java-based application, zookeeper uses much more memory on each server if deployed as cluster. Consul need less memory to run. I guess this is what @MrXiaKun means by too heavy.
